comments.content: Me, too! I have long curly red hair… but with so many people inside one venue, even that doesn't stand out so much. I'll be at the Linotype stand in the main hall a lot of the time. Stop by and I'll get you a coffee! I'm interested to hear more about your program in Zürich.

I hope you all are enjoying and taking lots of pictures to post on Flickr! :-)

ChrisL
Oh, good times! No much thinking about pix though. I might upload some sparse (plus bad) ones Sunday.. I'd guess the others took some really nice ones tho. :)
